english.segment1: How I long to be like a child again. Nothing to win. Enjoying You enjoying me. Yesterday is gone. Life won't stay the same. How I have changed. But You are and always will be
english.segment2: How I long to be like a child again. Nothing to win. Loving You just loving me. Memories aren't enough. Oh how I long for You. And You long too. Right here, right now I believe. Hear me cry
english.segment3: CHORUS. Please forgive me. Soften my heart I pray. Let me love You tomorrow. Even more than I do today
english.segment4: If You willed You would. My aspirings get the best of me. I'm sorry I push You so hard. It's not by might nor power. Holy Spirit consume me. My food is to do Your will. So hear me cry
